name: ORS Summary of Releases and TAPS
description:
The number of Releases and Temporary Absences in between two dates, specified at run time.
MOV0041 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 05/08/16

dataset.name: Releases
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE, AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, OMS_OWNER.MOVEMENT_REASONS AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE = AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_TYPE AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE = AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-07-2016 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('03-08-2016 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID = 'KMI' AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE IN ('REL'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, MOVEMENT_DATE, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: TAP
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE, AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, OMS_OWNER.MOVEMENT_REASONS AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE = AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_TYPE AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE = AT_MOVEMENT_REASONS.MOVEMENT_REASON_CODE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_TYPE) AND (AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = ('MOVE_TYPE')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.FROM_AGY_LOC_ID = AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (TRUNC(AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.MOVEMENT_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-07-2016 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('03-08-2016 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_MOV_LOC_FROM_OFFND_LOCTION.AGY_LOC_ID = 'KMI' AND AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_MOV_TYPE_DESC.CODE IN ('TAP'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, MOVEMENT_DATE, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Reason Summary
dataset.query: SELECT DESCRIPTION, COUNT(1) AS MOVEMENT_COUNT FROM ${tableId} GROUP BY DESCRIPTION ORDER BY DESCRIPTION

dataset.name: Reason Summary
dataset.query: SELECT DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(MOVEMENT_DATE, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS MOVEMENT_DATE, COUNT(1) AS MOVEMENT_COUNT FROM ${tableId} GROUP BY DESCRIPTION, MOVEMENT_DATE ORDER BY MOVEMENT_DATE, DESCRIPTION
